localized title: Deva Shapath Khota Saangen Khara Sangnar Nahi
plot outline: 'Chandu' an unemployed stage actor lies to his beloved wife to be an MBA student working in a Multinational Company. Under instructions from his mentor, he gets a job as a Sales Manager by falsely representing himself as a son from a rich family living in South Africa; now on a short visit to India. Hilarious situations arise when his boss plans to meet his parents.
title: Devashappath Khote Sangen
akas: Deva Shapath Khota Saangen Khara Sangnar Nahi (India, Marathi title)
plot: 'Chandu' an unemployed stage actor lies to his beloved wife to be an MBA student working in a Multinational Company. Under instructions from his mentor, he gets a job as a Sales Manager by falsely representing himself as a son from a rich family living in South Africa; now on a short visit to India. Hilarious situations arise when his boss plans to meet his parents.

Tatya Ugdepatil owner of a theater company Chandu is one of his prominent actor in his troupe thou his father is against his choice of profession.Chandu's mother wants him to get married an looking for a girl but he loves Tara he tells her that he is an MBA and working for MNC.But during an interview with Tara's father Tatya asks him to pose as salesman from wealthy family living in South Africa.The biggest problem arises when Tara's father wants to meet his parents and Chandu asks Tatya and troupe member Gangi to pose as his parents.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com

Tatya is the owner of a drama c/o where Chandu works as a stage actor. Chandu likes Tara. He lies to her that he is an MBA working with a MNC. Hilarious situations arise when Tara's parents set up a meeting with Chandu. Tatya instructs Chandu to represent himself as a Sales Manager and a son from a wealthy family living in South Africa; who are on a short visit to India.
